Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People share their opinions and reactions regarding the Australian budget and political landscape. A mix of posts voices support for the government's investments in nurses and aged care the empowerment of First Nations women lauds on economic accomplishments & electricity price cut and apprehension over Labor's budget. Other posts mention broken promises by Labor and a prediction of possible Reserve Bank actions. Content includes quotes and hashtags with politicians and economists being the sources for the voiced opinions.
